text.name: sys_description
text.text: Steam is an online content distribution, rights management and communication platform developed by Valve and available since September 12, 2003. Geared towards video games, it allows users to buy games, content for games , to update them automatically, to manage the multiplayer part of the games and offers community tools around games using Steam. Since October 2012, a department has been dedicated to software. Steam had in February 2015 more than 125 million users and in March 2017 more than 14,000 games.
